title: >>> The POMP, the Pageantry, and the PAIN
body_text:
The Pageantry
We've seen everything from Christmas lights and streamers to decorated garbage cans, balloons, and table cloths. Don't be too surprised to see the same traditional decorations at this upcoming "summer sizzler". But there is certainly plenty more in store, with the object to outdo all of the colorful creative ideas as seen at past ten events. Will it be the most unbelievable, unforgettable atmosphere ever witnessed or felt before? Let's just say one of the decorations extends from one side of the courts all the way to other.
A Who's Who
Reaching an event of this caliber is no easy task. All of
us
, together have made this sport, this journey what it is today. And so with that being said, it will be very interesting to see who shows up. As of midday August 12,
Facebook
can already confirm a record-breaking* 34 participants scheduled to appear at the centennial!
*Just about all of the Facebook invites reach about 15 confirmed attendees.
THE MAIN EVENT
It's the announcement the world has awaited! Finally, the competitiors are situated into one extraordinary confrontation!
The awesome, destructive three-some of
Pierce
,
Edwards
, and
Adams
meet an equally dominant force in
Fitzpatrick
,
Letsche
, and
Tronolone
! Six of the greatest phenoms in the same contest, on one glorious night, will do battle at the pinnacle of dodgeball!
Though this will be
the
main match, don't be surprised to see teams and captains split up, mainly because of the high expected turnout. There could be two games at once, boxball dodgeball, prison ball ... the list is endless! It's DODGEBALL 100!
body_html:
The Pageantry
We've seen everything from Christmas lights and streamers to decorated garbage cans, balloons, and table cloths. Don't be too surprised to see the same traditional decorations at this upcoming "summer sizzler". But there is certainly plenty more in store, with the object to outdo all of the colorful creative ideas as seen at past ten events. Will it be the most unbelievable, unforgettable atmosphere ever witnessed or felt before? Let's just say one of the decorations extends from one side of the courts all the way to other.

A Who's Who
Reaching an event of this caliber is no easy task. All of us, together have made this sport, this journey what it is today. And so with that being said, it will be very interesting to see who shows up. As of midday August 12, Facebook can already confirm a record-breaking* 34 participants scheduled to appear at the centennial!

*Just about all of the Facebook invites reach about 15 confirmed attendees.

THE MAIN EVENT
It's the announcement the world has awaited! Finally, the competitiors are situated into one extraordinary confrontation!

The awesome, destructive three-some of Pierce, Edwards, and Adams meet an equally dominant force in Fitzpatrick, Letsche, and Tronolone! Six of the greatest phenoms in the same contest, on one glorious night, will do battle at the pinnacle of dodgeball!

Though this will be the main match, don't be surprised to see teams and captains split up, mainly because of the high expected turnout. There could be two games at once, boxball dodgeball, prison ball ... the list is endless! It's DODGEBALL 100!
